answers.answer: Were you diagnosed with cystic fibrosis?Pancreatic cancer?The reason for the CT Scan was?Did you discuss your CT Scan results with the ordering physician?What did he/she say?

question: I am 65 years old and have been a type 2 Diabetic for ten years.  A recent CT scan showed I have a partically fatty-replaced pancreas.  Is there a connection between Diabetes and this problem and how does this occur?  What is the treatment? Thanks
title: Daniel300
